CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISNULL(Bedrooms_Wanted__c) ), 'Bedrooms Wanted; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Missing_Documentation__c)) ), 'Missing Documentation; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Housing_Stability_Status__c)) ), 'Housing Stability Status; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), AdminCurrentRentIssue__c ), 'Current Rent; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), AdminDesiredRentIssue__c ), 'Desired Rent; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(Geographic_Preferences__c) ), 'Geographic Preferences; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Housing_Type__c)) ), 'Housing Type; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(Reason_to_Move__c) ), 'Reason To Move; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Full_Time_Student__c)) ), 'Full Time Student; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Credit_Problem__c)) ), 'Credit Problem; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Criminal_History__c)) ), 'Criminal History; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Prior_Eviction__c)) ), 'Prior Eviction; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Recommend_Credit_Report__c)) ), 'Recommend Credit Report; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Recommend_Monthly_Budget__c)) ), 'Recommend Monthly Budget; ', '' ) &
IF( AND( OR( Active_HC_Service_Case__c, Active_CMH_Service_Case__c), ISBLANK(TEXT(Recommend_Rent_Savings_Plan__c)) ), 'Recommend Rent Savings Plan; ', '' )
CustomField.label: Essential Fields Missing HC
